summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; authorizing certain expenditures for materials, equipment, superintendent, engineering and transportation in connection with a Works Progress Administration project of clearing and maintaining the Skagit transmission right-of-way in Snohomish County; making an appropriation from the Light Fund therefor; and authorizing the Superintendent of Lighting to make application for a Federal W. P. A. project therefor.
